title: Smart Data Models - Mosquito Density data Model
description: A Data Model for density of mosquitoes in cities.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be MosquitoDensity

dataDescriptor.description: Relationship. URI pointing to the data-descriptor entity

mosquitoDensity.description: Property. The binomial (or) zoological nomenclature of the mosquito species and its count as identified by the device corresponding to this observation..

maleSpeciesCount.description: Property. The total count of the male mosquitoes of the species identified by the device..

totalSpeciesCount.description: Property. The total count of a particular species detected by the device..

mosquitoSpecies.description: Property. The binomial/ zoological nomenclature of the mosquito species as identified by the device.

femaleSpeciesCount.description: Property. The total count of the female mosquitoes of the species identified by the device..

deviceInfo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Information about the device associated with the observations.

rfID.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Gives the ID of the RFID reader.

deviceBatteryStatus.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Gives the Battery charging status of the reporting device(Connected, Disconnected).

deviceName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Device Name or Station name of the sensor device/station corresponding to this observation.

deviceID.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Device ID of the physical sensor/ measurement station corresponding to this observation.

measurand.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Property/properties sensed/observed/measured by the device.

deviceSimNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Gives the sim number of the device in the waste management vehicle.

deviceModel.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Describes the information of the device, sensor or system in consideration.

brandName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the brand associated with an entity, e.g., sensor, device etc.

manufacturerName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the manufacturer associated with an entity, e.g., sensor, device etc.

modelName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of a specific model associated with an entity, e.g., sensor, device etc.

modelURL.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. URL providing further information of a specific model associated with an entity, e.g., sensor, device etc.

observationDateTime.description: Property. Last reported time of observation.

airTemperature.description: Property. Observed value of air temperature. Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

precipitation.description: Property. Observed precipitation/rainfall level over a given duration.
